Building your own signature solution with eMACH.ai

paragraphs: We help banks help businesses create the wealth of the world
Driving the heart of digital transformations for banks
Products that leverage big data, AI and conversational technologies
Redefining the landscape of government, corporate & retail operations in the digital age

Intellect’s First Principles Thinking-based Enterprise Connected Intelligence Platform, eMACH.ai, enables financial institutions to build future-ready technology solutions that provide a significant global competitive edge.This intelligent open finance platform keeps a bank’s customer in focus, be it retail, HNI, SME, or corporate, the events in their financial journey, events created by bank operations or events generated by regulators and compliance. Financial institutions can orchestrate their offerings based on these events to ensure customer satisfaction and regulatory compliance.All products from Intellect have been built with eMACH.ai design principles, thus helping Banks and Financial Institutions with agility, flexibility and composability, keeping the customer at the centre.
